# MyFirstProjectReadme
[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/kconnor20/my-first-project.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/kconnor20/my-first-project)

MyFirstProject is designed to help me make my first steps as an awesome package developer.

## Core functionality
At this point in time, key aspects of the package are:

- `circlearea` for calculating the area of circle, given the radius.


# Install this package
```{r}
devtools::install_github("kconnor20/my-first-project")
```
